de.unisiegen.tpml.core.languages
Interface LanguageTypeScanner

All Superinterfaces:
LanguageScanner, java_cup.runtime.Scanner
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLanguageTypeScanner, L1TypeScanner, L3TypeScanner, L4TypeScanner
public interface LanguageTypeScanner
extends LanguageScanner

Base interface for type scanners for the various languages, which are used in conjunction with the LanguageTypeParsers to translate the string representation of monomorphic types to MonoType hierarchies, in a way similar to the LanguageScanner, which is used to tokenize the string representation of expressions. This interface does not add methods to LanguageScanner, but is solely used as a marker interface.

Version:
$Rev: 380 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
Language, LanguageTypeParser
